newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: Spot Saudi riyal steady, deposit rates fall.
newsitem.headline: Spot Saudi riyal steady, deposit rates fall.

text.p: The spot Saudi riyal was steady against the dollar this week but riyal interbank deposit rates dropped between 1/16 and 1/8 point in a liquid market.
Dealers in Saudi said on Wednesday activity focused on the forward market.
"Riyal rates dropped between 1/16 and 1/8 point, but the spot Saudi riyal was basically unchanged," one Riyadh dealer said. The spot riyal was quoted at 3.7506/07 to the dollar.
Spot-next and one-week interbank deposit rates were put at 5-3/4, 5/8 percent and 5-13/16, 11/16 percent respectively.
One-month funds were at 5-7/8, 3/4 percent, three months at 5-15/16, 13/16 percent, six months at six, 5-7/8 and one-year maturities at 6-3/16, 1/16 percent.
